articles.description: APPLE faces new legal action over 2017's batterygate, which saw iPhone performance throttled to prevent handsets with ageing batteries from shutting down unexpectedly.
articles.content: Apple has been clobbered with another lawsuit that claims the Californian company intentionally slowed down older iPhone models. The lawsuit, which was filed in Italy by consumer advocacy group Euroc… [+2728 chars]

articles.title: Australian games studios generated $140.4m in revenue in 2020 - PC Games Insider
articles.description: Australian games firms generated AU$184.6m ($140.4m) in revenue last year. That's according to the region's industry trade body The Interactive Games and Entertainment Association (IGEA), which sa...
